mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTIFICATION (NOTIFICATION_NO, RECEIVER_NO, SENDER_NO, NOTIFICATION_CONTENT, CREATE_DT, NOTIFICATION_URL, NOTIFICATION_TYPE) VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{receiverNo}, #{senderNo}, #{notificationContent}, SYSDATE, #{notificationURL}, #{notificationType})
mapper.select: SELECT NOTIFICATION_NO, RECEIVER_NO, SENDER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, USER_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, NOTIFICATION_CONTENT FROM NOTIFICATION JOIN "USER" ON USER_NO = SENDER_NO JOIN PRODUCT USING (USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY 1 DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY
